description: This is a test suite written in JSX for a React component named 'Home'. It contains test cases that simulate user interactions to verify the behavior of a modal component, route navigation, and button actions within the 'Home' component. The test code uses @testing-library/react and react-router-dom to render components and simulate events.

classes.name: Page
classes.description: A simple functional component used within the test to simulate different pages for route testing.

methods.name: setup
methods.description: A helper function to render the 'Home' component within a MemoryRouter with initial route entries, setting up the test environment.
